data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=UChiWUkTA4YQ7kNvgFnWOLF&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD9wBoZHp3VJ6TdCBt3KF1vzh3iQ9YLSAu1l_kJo5jHMg&oe=66CC6537)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=PXBIkkTUHT0Q7kNvgEgxGR1&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBy-QSF-DvK_t5DwOHjcRRLEqqClnIlP4ywavajL60vFg&oe=66CC72D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=w65L3LMSGXgQ7kNvgG0-2rk&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAm9XT0beDKy5ymGYINz38wcokh5z2CReBW9x8lB06qNw&oe=66CC5E09)
